tourBios.curYrHigh: Easily qualified for the PGA TOUR China Series as a fully exempt member with rounds of 72-74-74-71 at the First Global Qualifying Tournament in Shenzhen. Finished T10 with Ben Campbell and Tsung Chieh Wang.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2013 Malaysian Amateur, shooting rounds of 68-66-72-68—including birdies on his final two holes—to edge Thailand's Poom Saksansin by a shot at Royal Pahang GC…Final event as an amateur was the 2014 Queensland PGA Championship. Opened with a 62 at the PGA Tour of Australasia event, fired a second-round 64 and settled for a T24 finish with Terry Pilkadaris, John Younger, Matt Jager, Matthew Millar and fellow amateur Taylor Macdonald.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Easily qualified for the PGA TOUR China Series as a fully exempt member with rounds of 72-74-74-71 at the First Global Qualifying Tournament in Shenzhen. Finished T10 with Ben Campbell and Tsung Chieh Wang.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T44th in 2015 at the Buick Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T48th in Total Eagles on the PGA Tour China Series.
